message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,100,000. It's a fantastic deal for you, considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking of making a counteroffer. I'm willing to pay $950,000 for the product. It's a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand your offer, but I'm still hoping to get closer to my desired price.  I'm willing to come down to $1,000,000.  This is still a great deal for you, considering the value of the product to you.  Let's make this happen!

I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $900,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product to me.
